Tourism and Hotel Business Administration (Hospitality)

3 of July of 2020

“Pandemic and re-acquaintance with fish and shellfish”

The Tourism and Hotel Business Administration Faculty invites to The Virtual Café: How to reinvent the tourism sector? This time, the theme will be “Pandemic and re-acquaintance with fish and shellfish.”

Biblioteca

9 of July of 2020

“Pan’s Labyrinth” at the next Film Chats

Aiming to awaken a taste and a critical sense for cinema, the Library invites the Externadista community to enjoy, during June and July, a selection of seven films.

Law

2 of July of 2020

Virtual CEDEF: Analysis of the “Erase and Start Over” proposed bill regarding habeas data

The Externado Financial and Securities Exchange Law Department and the Financial Law and Stock Exchange Observatory, invite the general public to its next Center for Studies in Financial Law –CEDEF.

1 of July of 2020

Informative Webinar: Virtual Hotel Digital Marketing Certification

The Tourism and Hotel Business Administration Faculty invites to this conference, aimed at those looking for digital marketing tools to apply to their hotels.
